name: The Converse
description:
A mystery with unreal obstacles. Meet various obstacles and discover what they do. 

The Converse is a very very difficult and I am sure no one will be able to beat it in their 1st try.  

Just find all the keys and open doors to reach the final black door. Remember, touch a thing only when it is useful and you can carry only 1 key at a time.

The Converse is made for Brackeys GamJam 2022.1
